## Description {#details}

A helper class for register coalescers.

When deciding if two registers can be coalesced, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescerpair">CoalescerPair</a> can determine if a copy instruction would become an identity copy after coalescing.

Definition at line 28 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registercoalescer-h">RegisterCoalescer.h</a>.

### CoalescerPair() {#abf17891df4552960f7cad19b8ca82b62}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::CoalescerPair::CoalescerPair (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> VirtReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &amp; tri)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Create a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescerpair">CoalescerPair</a> representing a virtreg-to-physreg copy.

No need to call <a href="#acf12cb8b07d5443c8777257d1b9a1dc7">setRegisters()</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### flip() {#a46ebf2b548d5b38599073fe56b75bec0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool CoalescerPair::flip ()">
Swap SrcReg and DstReg.

Return false if swapping is impossible because DstReg is a physical register, or SubIdx is set.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registercoalescer-h/#l00074">74</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registercoalescer-h">RegisterCoalescer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registercoalescer-cpp/#l00541">541</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registercoalescer-cpp">RegisterCoalescer.cpp</a>.

### NewRC {#ad747588bde4decbb98b226aff52e861f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const TargetRegisterClass&#42; llvm::CoalescerPair::NewRC = nullptr</>}>
The register class of the coalesced register, or NULL if DstReg is a physreg.

This register class may be a super-register of both SrcReg and DstReg.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registercoalescer-h/#l00057">57</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registercoalescer-h">RegisterCoalescer.h</a>.
